level.heading: Addition, modification, and deletion of referenced standards.
level.text: ยง28-103.19 Addition, modification, and deletion of referenced standards. The standards referenced in this code may be added to, deleted or modified pursuant to local law or by rule of the department. Every such rule adding, deleting or modifying a referenced standard shall indicate the promulgating agency of the standard, the standard identification, the effective date and title and the section or sections of this code to which such standard applies. The commissioner shall act in consultation with the fire commissioner on matters relating to fire safety. Exception: Referenced standards in the New York city plumbing code, other than referenced national standards contained in chapter 13 of such code, shall not be added to, deleted, or modified by rule.
